title: Lowest Political Stability
description: In 2023, Syria had one of the lowest scores for political stability and absence of violence/terrorism, with an estimate of -2.75.

title: Lowest Control of Corruption
description: Syria ranked extremely low in control of corruption in 2023, with a percentile rank of 0.47%.

title: Lowest Regulatory Quality
description: In 2023, Syria had one of the lowest regulatory quality scores, with a lower bound percentile rank of 0.47%.

title: Highest Pupil-Teacher Ratio in Tertiary Education
description: In 2015, Syria had a very high pupil-teacher ratio in tertiary education, with 64.4 students per teacher.

title: High Merchandise Exports to MENA
description: In 2023, 58.07% of Syria's total merchandise exports were to low- and middle-income economies in the Middle East & North Africa.
